_source.text: 28. Carolina Panthers (No. 26; Down 2; L, 20-7 vs. TB) The Jimmy Clausen era will start in Carolina this week but I'm not sure it'll be much better than the Matt Moore era.

text: 28. Carolina Panthers (No. 26; Down 2; L, 20-7 vs. TB) The **Jimmy** **Clausen** era will start in Carolina this week but I'm not sure it'll be much **better** **than** the **Matt** **Moore** era.

_source.text: 1 Anquan Boldin - Great pick if he makes it to the fourth round 2 Beanie Wells - Better than where he's slotted to go imo 3 Jerome Harrison - Could get the majority of carries in Cleveland 4 Arian Foster - I'll look for him in the last rounds and if we can spare the pick we'll take him and hope he takes over the starting role later in the season
